meanings.sent1: The man looked very tuxedoed at the fancy event.
meanings.sent2: She felt elegant and tuxedoed in her black suit.
meanings.sent3: The penguin felt jealous of the tuxedoed waiter.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was tuxedoed with stars, shimmering above.
meanings.sent5: The tuxedoed cat strutted down the street with confidence.

meanings.sent1: The tuxedoed gentleman greeted guests at the entrance.
meanings.sent2: They all looked sharp and tuxedoed for the gala.
meanings.sent3: The tuxedoed dog stole the show at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was tuxedoed with buildings reaching high.
meanings.sent5: The tuxedoed violinist played a beautiful melody at the concert.
